status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - DONE: Agent finished.
 - UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

Negative value means tablestats group collectors are always disabled.

common.description: ChangeCommonAgentParams contains parameters that can be changed for all Agents.

disable.description: Disable this Agent. Can't be used with enabled.

disable_push_metrics.description: Disables push metrics, pmm-server starts to pull it, can't be used with enable_push_metrics.

enable.description: Enable this Agent. Can't be used with disabled.

enable_push_metrics.description:
Enables push metrics with vmagent, can't be used with disable_push_metrics.
Can't be used with agent version lower then 2.12 and unsupported agents.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - DONE: Agent finished.
 - UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

vmagent.description:
VMAgent runs on Generic or Container Node alongside pmm-agent.
It scrapes other exporter Agents that are configured with push_metrics_enabled
and uses Prometheus remote write protocol to push metrics to PMM Server.

post.summary: ListAgents returns a list of all Agents.

node_id.description:
Return only Agents that provide insights for that Node.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: pmm_agent_id, node_id, service_id.

pmm_agent_id.description:
Return only Agents started by this pmm-agent.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: pmm_agent_id, node_id, service_id.

service_id.description:
Return only Agents that provide insights for that Service.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: pmm_agent_id, node_id, service_id.

items.description: RemoteNode represents generic remote Node. It's a node where we don't run pmm-agents. Only external exporters can run on Remote Nodes.

node_name.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name.

items.description: RemoteAzureDatabaseNode represents remote AzureDatabase Node. Agents can't run on Remote AzureDatabase Nodes.

node_name.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name.

items.description: RemoteRDSNode represents remote RDS Node. Agents can't run on Remote RDS Nodes.
